author: sky.cactus
content: Why does the template (and thus all EIPs) skip the first level of nesting and go straight to `##`?

author: sky.cactus
content: I wonder if it would be worthwhile to do a one-time mass change to correctly start with `#`.  While it is not technically illegal to skip a level of nesting in markdown, it feels like bad form.

author: hudsonjameson
content:
<@!301186049323958275> I'll leave comments/affirmations that I've checked certain EIPs now.

https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/3085: It says it can be merged now. Was the only problem the inability to previously merge because of a CI issue?

https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/3065 - Merged. Left comment.

https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/3023#pullrequestreview-526007841: Left comment and correction to the EIP. Didn't merge.

https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/2995: Left comment, didn't merge.

https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/2920: Left comment.

Sorry for the delay.

author: sky.cactus
content: I recommend merging any that you think are worthy of being merged, I am unlikely to merge them unless your comments are incredibly compelling.  ðŸ™‚

author: sky.cactus
content: 3085 was an EIP number squatting issue but the author went with the number I suggested.  Only reason I haven't merged it now is because something with GitHub is broken.

author: hudsonjameson
content: Oh got it. I will merge that one, and wait a few days for the others to both give authors a chance to rebut and other editors to chime in.

author: sky.cactus
content: Actually, looks like GitHub is fixed, merging that one now.

author: sky.cactus
content: Thanks for taking the time to go over them!

content: Hit me up next time this happens. I need nudging to get on it ðŸ™‚
